104506.name: Fly on aeroplanes
104506.description: Share of US respondents who said they were "less willing" to fly on aeroplanes.

source.name: Reaction to Terrorism - Gallup (2019)
source.additionalInfo:
Share of US respondents who said they were "less willing" to do certain activities as a result of terrorist events.

They were asked: "As a result of the events relating to terrorism in recent years, would you say that now you are less willing to --, or not?"

Data for 2001 was sampled on 2001 Sep 14-15
Data for 2002 was sampled on 2002 Mar 8-9
Data for 2006 was sampled on 2006 Aug 18-20
Data for 2011 was sampled on 2011 Jul 15-17
Data for 2017 was sampled on 2017 Jun 7-11
